[[1991â92 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1991â92]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) participated in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1990â91 Turkish Second Football League|1990â91]] season for the 17th time and finished third. The team also participated in [[TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±]] (Turkish Cup) in [[1990â91 Turkish Cup|1990â91]] and eliminated at Round 2. ==Pre-season== * 19.08.1990 - Sakaryaspor-MÄ°Y: 2-0. ''Sakaryaspor'': Adem 35', Åenol 44'. ==1990â91 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group C in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[Turkish Second Football League 1990-91|1990-91]] Season. League played in three groups two with 18 teams and one with 17 teams. Bottom three teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]], whereas top team promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] at the end of the season[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/9091/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 25 August 2009.. MÄ°Y finished 3rd with 19 wins and 69 goals. ===League table=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group C in [[1990â91 Turkish Second Football League|1990â91]] season is shown in the following tableStandings and results from [http://www.tff.org/default.aspx?pageID=811 TFF second league page]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
